JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central Consultant – Travel Operations
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you an experienced and passionate professional, eager to transform businesses through innovative technology solutions? Dream of working for an international company where your ideas matter, and your opportunities to make an impact are great? Then this opportunity is exactly for you!

We are currently looking for a skilled and motivated individual to join our Implementation Department as a Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central Consultant.

Your responsibilities:

  • Implementing Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central and TravelOperations solutions for our clients.
  • Managing various workstreams during implementations.
  • Providing valuable insights and expertise to our product development team.
  • Delivering ongoing support and improvements for our customers.

Who are you?

We imagine that you have:

  • At least 5 years of experience with Business Central (functional experience).
  • Experience with Business Central/Navision implementation projects.
  • Ideally, knowledge of the travel industry, though not required.
  • A proactive, detail-oriented, and ambitious mindset, with strong consulting and communication skills.
  • The ability to thrive both in a team environment and when working independently.
  • Well-developed consulting and communication skills in English (verbal as well as written).
  • A passion for travel – both personally and professionally.


What we offer:

  • A global impact: TravelOperations partners with clients across the globe. You will have the opportunity to work with leading travel agencies, airlines, and leisure-focused businesses to create tailored solutions that drive success.
  • A strong, collaborative team: You will be joining a dynamic team of 25 colleagues, including a specialized group of five highly skilled Business Central consultants who work on implementation projects. You'll have plenty of opportunities for knowledge sharing and professional sparring with experienced team members.
  • An international and growing company: With over 80 employees, TravelOperations is a rapidly expanding company that values both individual and team contributions. Our work culture emphasizes innovation, flexibility, and employee development, ensuring that every voice is heard.
  • Flexibility to work from our offices in Aalborg, Copenhagen, or Halmstad.
  • The opportunity to work with the latest Microsoft technologies alongside skilled Dynamics professionals.
  • A healthy work-life balance, with a focus on employee well-being and development.

Team culture and values
At TravelOperations, we believe in creating an environment where employees can thrive both professionally and personally. With an international and inclusive culture, we emphasize innovation, flexibility, and personal development.

How to apply
We are collaborating with Right People Group for this position, and if you would like to know more, please contact our recruitment partner Mashiah Moltrup-Ryom at mmr@rightpeoplegroup.com, or apply online.

Applications are reviewed continuously, and we will close the process once the right candidate is found.

All information will be treated confidentially and in accordance with data protection regulations. At our company, diversity and inclusion are core values. We welcome applicants of all genders, striving for a workplace where everyone feels valued and empowered. Join us in building an inclusive future where diversity is celebrated as a strength.

About Travel Operations A/S
TravelOperations enable travel businesses worldwide to perform better and work smarter. We are an experienced team of dedicated technology and travel consultants that offer best-in-class industry-specific ERP and CRM solutions for travel businesses.

Our ambition is to help travel businesses exceed expectations and deliver on their customer’s ever-changing needs and demands with modern cloud-based technology. With offices in Denmark, Sweden, the USA, Australia, and India, TravelOperations is set up to deliver outstanding customer service no matter where you are located.
